did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Wesleyan Methodist Church. Haskinville Methodist Charge (Haskinville, N.Y.)

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Two volumes containing quarterly conference minutes, meeting minutes from all appointments on the circuit, trustee meeting meeting minutes and annual meeting minutes; register of members for each of the charges.

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: The Haskinville Wesleyan Methodist Church was formed in 1831 as was the major charge on the Haskinville circuit. The circuit included Haskinville, the Gulf, Butcher Hill, Greenville, Beagles, and Wallace. A church building was built in 1876.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Two volumes containing quarterly conference minutes (1862-1908), meeting minutes from all appointments on the circuit, trustee meeting meeting minutes and annual meeting minutes (1882-1908); register of members for each of the charges.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: Not to be published or otherwise released in such form that any individual in the records can be identified.
